price: (55) And thus do We detail the verses, and [thus] the way of the criminals will become evident.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nufaṣṣilu al-āyāti walitastabīna sabīlu al-muj'rimīna
